name: 李紹先
objective: This course introduces fundamental concepts in Materials Science & Engineering. You will learn about the material structure, how structure dictates properties and how processing can change the structures.
schedule:
Week 1 to 8:
Phase Diagrams for Metallic System (Chapter 9)
Phase Transformations (Chapter 10)
Applications and Processing of Metal Alloys (Chapter 11)

Week 9: Mid term

Week 10-17:
Ceramic Materials- (Chapter 12)
Applications and Processing of Ceramic Materials (Chapter 13)
Composites (Chapter 16)
Corrosion and Degradation of Materials (Chapter 17)
Electrical Properties of Materials (Chapter 18)

Week 18 Final exam
materials:
Materials Science and Engineering
Tenth Edition
WILLIAM D.CALLISTER, JR. and DAVID G. RETHWISCH
滄海書局有限公司
remarks: 本學期原則採實體授課方式； 因應疫情警戒標準，本學期教學及授課方式請依照學校網頁所公布之訊息為準： (https://oaa.ntut.edu.tw/p/404-1008-98622.php?Lang=zh-tw)
